name: Let's go to school
description:
Lets Go To School is an adventure game with the main character named fail, fail is a student who lives in a village, the lesson he likes is mathematics, in a journey to school he has to go through various obstacles and answer various math problems he found on the trip .

The story begins as he runs from home to his school. On the journey the player will be confronted by monsters that can appear at any time. In addition the player also has to collect as many points as he can by collecting existing questions boxes. Scores of questions from this game can be uploaded and ranked with all previous players.

The excitement of this game occurs when we are able to answer various questions that arise and save themselves from monsters. The farther runs the more opportunities that can be gained. When an unanswered question does not cause the player game over directly, it only happens when we touch and hit the mosquito in front of the player.
